function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Interpret geographic origin more broadly, incentivize participation from diverse european regions, and dedicate funding or separate calls for coordination and harmonization of multicentric studies.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporate standard wording for broad informed consent in call documents, make it a requirement for future consortia, and provide guidance on data sharing best practices.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Include knowledge scouting activities as a dedicated work package in research projects to produce evidence while studies are underway and confirm scientific importance and usefulness of early results.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement standardized security protocols, encryption, and privacy-preserving technologies across all local nodes. conduct regular security assessments and audits.","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing robust data security measures, regular audits, and redundancy plans","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Obtaining informed consent, anonymizing patient data, and complying with data protection laws","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing data standardization protocols, harmonization procedures, and international code mappings","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement robust data cleaning and validation processes, and ensure strict data governance and security measures","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, regular testing, and isolation measures for infected individuals","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting individual risk assessments to determine the appropriate ppe for each worker and providing necessary training on proper usage","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement robust access controls, data encryption, and secure authentication measures, and conduct regular security audits and compliance checks.","category":"Maintainance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of stringent data protection policies, encryption, and access controls.","category":"Separate water facilities (toilets/bathrooms for contaminated)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict privacy regulations, transparent data collection policies, and secure data storage practices.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Develop scalable iot solutions and utilize 5g networks to handle increasing device numbers and data transmission","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement energy-efficient security algorithms and data encryption to ensure accurate and secure data collection","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular calibration and maintenance of iot devices, validation of results against traditional diagnostic methods, and providing training to healthcare professionals for interpreting iot device data.","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Broaden the scope of research to include a comprehensive approach to public health and infectious diseases, not limited to covid-19, and prioritize preparedness for future outbreaks.","category":"Maintainance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Thorough testing and validation of technologies before widespread implementation","category":"Separate water facilities (toilets/bathrooms for contaminated)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Developing redundant systems, regular security audits, and staff training for cyber security.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Strict safety protocols, regular maintenance and inspections, public education on safety measures","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Installing separately zoned central air-conditioning with individual filter systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improved ventilation, hygiene measures, and public health education","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement pressure differentials and continuous positive airflow from the corridor into the elevator shaft","category":"Separate water facilities (toilets/bathrooms for contaminated)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Continuous inflow of filtered, lightly pressurized air from the top of the cabin, expulsion at the bottom, and adjustment of airflow based on cabin occupancy","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict containment measures in communal areas to reduce exposure risk","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improve pressure differentials and air circulation to create positive flow from private to communal spaces","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Design and construct effective containment spaces with sealed doors and rapid air exchange","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of alternative sanitation solutions, such as communal bathrooms with enhanced cleaning protocols","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improved ventilation and air exchange systems, enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols, and crowd management strategies","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Creation of containment spaces with sealed doors and rapid air exchange, implementation of airlock systems if necessary","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase the use of fresh external air or install hepa filters","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Design separate air cycles for communal and private spaces","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Design spaces and ventilation systems to accommodate self-isolation areas","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of floor-level air returns and proper ventilation design","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and testing of ventilation systems, installation of high-efficiency air filters, and increasing outside air flow rate","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incorporation of pandemic-resilient design principles into architectural planning","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing ventilation and air filtration systems, and promoting behavioral changes to reduce transmission","category":"Maintainance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Public health education, enforcement of regulations, and social influence campaigns","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Promoting social connectedness, mental health support, and hybrid models for education and work","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improve ventilation systems, redesign common areas, and implement stricter protocols for quarantine facilities","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improve quarantine protocols, enhance surveillance and monitoring, and implement early detection systems","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement stricter quarantine measures and regular testing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enhance ventilation systems and implement strict infection control measures","category":"Maintainance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement online reservation systems, virtual queuing, or staggered entry times to minimize congestion and prolonged close contact outside shops.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement one-way aisle systems, designate specific entry and exit points for aisles, and provide clear signage to guide shoppers.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improve ventilation systems, limit seating density, and enforce face mask usage on public transport.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement social distancing rules, reduce seating, and encourage online ordering and delivery services","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Provide clear guidance, signage, and education on the importance of social distancing","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement contactless delivery, sanitization protocols, and tracking of delivery personnel","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing social distancing measures and ventilation improvements","category":"Maintainance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"}]}
